metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3626 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
LibTIFF 4.4.0 has an out-of-bounds write in _TIFFmemset in libtiff/tif_unix.c:340 when called from processCropSelections, tools/tiffcrop.c:7619, allowing attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit 236b7191.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3626` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.4.0-4ubuntu3.1
libtiff-tools - 4.4.0-4ubuntu3.1
libtiff5 - 4.4.0-4ubuntu3.1
libtiffxx5 - 4.4.0-4ubuntu3.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-4ubuntu3.1').
